pages.text: Each fish has the following potential rarity (chance) under different $(item)weather$() and $(item)time$() conditions. The higher the rarity, the bigger, more valuable, and harder to find the fish:$(br)$(li) $(item)ORDINARY$() (Common): 0-50%%$(br)$(li) $(item)UNCOMMON$() (Uncommon): 50-60%%$(br)$(li) $(item)RARE$() (Rare): 60-75%%
